metadata.title: CVE-2021-37980 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Inappropriate implementation in Sandbox in Google Chrome prior to94.0.4606.81 allowed a remote attacker to potentially bypass site isolationvia Windows.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
